verses.text: God \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* refuge \w and|strong="H1121"\w* strength, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* very present help \w in|strong="H5921"\w* trouble.

Therefore \w we|strong="H3068"\w* won’t be afraid, though \w the|strong="H4672"\w* earth changes, though \w the|strong="H4672"\w* mountains \w are|strong="H6869"\w* shaken \w into|strong="H5797"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* heart \w of|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* seas;

though \w its|strong="H5921"\w* waters roar \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w are|strong="H2022"\w* troubled, though \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* tremble \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* swelling. \qs Selah.\qs*

\w There|strong="H2022"\w* \w is|strong="H4325"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* river, \w the|strong="H2022"\w* streams \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w which|strong="H4325"\w* \w make|strong="H1993"\w* \w the|strong="H2022"\w* city \w of|strong="H2022"\w* God glad, \w the|strong="H2022"\w* holy place \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H2022"\w* tents \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H2022"\w* Most High.

God \w is|strong="H5892"\w* within her. \w She|strong="H5892"\w* \w shall|strong="H5892"\w* \w not|strong="H5892"\w* \w be|strong="H5892"\w* moved. God \w will|strong="H5892"\w* help her \w at|strong="H5892"\w* dawn.

\w The|strong="H7130"\w* nations raged. \w The|strong="H7130"\w* kingdoms \w were|strong="H1077"\w* \w moved|strong="H4131"\w*. \w He|strong="H1242"\w* lifted \w his|strong="H7130"\w* voice \w and|strong="H1242"\w* \w the|strong="H7130"\w* earth melted.

\w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* Armies \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w with|strong="H6963"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w*. \w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* Jacob \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* refuge. \qs Selah.\qs*

\w Come|strong="H6635"\w*, see \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*’s works, what desolations \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w makes|strong="H7760"\w* wars cease \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* end \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* breaks \w the|strong="H3068"\w* bow, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* shatters \w the|strong="H3068"\w* spear. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* burns \w the|strong="H3068"\w* chariots \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fire.

“\w Be|strong="H7665"\w* \w still|strong="H7673"\w*, \w and|strong="H7198"\w* know \w that|strong="H4421"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* am God. \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H7665"\w* exalted \w among|strong="H7097"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* nations. \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H7665"\w* exalted \w in|strong="H4421"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* earth.”

\w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3045"\w* Armies \w is|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w us|strong="H3045"\w*. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* God \w of|strong="H3045"\w* Jacob \w is|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* refuge. \qs Selah.\qs*
